intro.dialogue: So, what is your name? I feel like it's rude to not ask for the name of my date.
Oh my, where are my manners! I'm way too quick and rushing into things again. My name is Aaliyah, nice to meet you.
So, now that you asked me a question, I want to know more about you! Where are you from? I've never seen anyone like you, and trust me, I've seen a lot of people.
I'm from Earth.
Earth? Never heard of that before. It sounds like a beautiful place. Just the name makes me want to visit sometime!
Yeah, very beautiful. Earth has lots of water.
Really? That sounds amazing! I love that place already. Earth must be far if I have never seen anyone like you before. Do all people from Earth look like you?
I mean, sort of? I'm surprised you have never seen a human before. I've seen octolings plenty.
REALLY? WHERE! WHAT DO THEY LOOK LIKE? WHAT DO THEY DO? HOW DO I GET TO EARTH?
Sorry, I got a little excited. You see, I lost my family at sea. I washed up on the shore when I was little, and someone took me with them.
Eventually, I ended up here, and I've been looking for my parents ever since.
Can't you just get out?
You see, I can walk and sit on non-water objects, but it tires me out greatly. There is no sea nearby, and no lakes in the area are connected to the sea, so I'm kind of stuck.
But if you have heard of octo people like me, you must be able to tell me about them! What are the octo people like on Earth?
Yeah, well, funny story actually. You guys mostly appear in Japanese adult comic books.
That sounds so cool! I bet we're superheroes fighting crime! These tentacles are made to fight crime.
...yeah... definitely... you guys are superheroes for sure. Your tentacles really show people who's boss...
Man does Earth sound exciting! Too bad I'm mostly stuck at this fountain.
How far can you go without water?

I sadly can't leave much further than the park. It's really frustrating, but I guess there is nothing to be done about it. I just kind of sit here and wait for people to come along that I can talk to.
But oh my, I'm oversharing. Thanks for keeping me company though. I'm here if you're looking for me.
No problem, Aaliyah. It's been nice talking to you. I'll definitely come back if I'm in the area and looking for some company. Take care!
Thank you! I'll be right here, waiting. Take care too, and maybe next time you visit, you can tell me more about Earth and those octo people. Goodbye for now!

Do blow her a kiss on the way out?
Press W for no.
Press S for Yes.
